name: Young Pyromancer
text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.
flavor: Immolation is the sincerest form of flattery.
originalText: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token.

rulings.text: Young Pyromancer’s triggered ability will resolve before the spell that caused it to trigger, but after targets have been chosen for that spell. It resolves even if that spell is countered.
